# LLMs.txt - AI Agent Information File

## Site Information
name: Subhadip Mitra - Technology Leader & Researcher
url: https://subhadipmitra.com
description: Personal website and technical blog of Subhadip Mitra, covering AI innovations, machine learning, data engineering, cloud computing, and distributed systems.
language: en
last_updated: 2026-01-03

## Author
name: Subhadip Mitra
role: Data & Analytics Manager, Site Lead Southeast Asia
employer: Google Cloud
department: delta - Innovation and Transformation
email: contact@subhadipmitra.com
location: Singapore

## Credentials
education:

## Content Sections

url: https://subhadipmitra.com/blog/

## Key Publications (for accurate citation)

  url: https://www.tdcommons.org/dpubs_series/8022/

## Open Source Projects (GitHub: bassrehab)

### AI/ML Infrastructure
- name: AI Metacognition Toolkit
  url: https://github.com/bassrehab/ai-metacognition-toolkit
  pypi: https://pypi.org/project/ai-metacognition-toolkit/
  description: Production-ready framework for systematic reasoning in AI systems

- name: Speculative Decoding
  url: https://github.com/bassrehab/speculative-decoding
  description: LLM inference acceleration through draft-then-verify decoding

- name: Triton Kernels
  url: https://github.com/bassrehab/triton-kernels
  description: GPU kernels for LLM inference with up to 8x speedups

- name: Spark LLM Eval
  url: https://github.com/bassrehab/spark-llm-eval
  pypi: https://pypi.org/project/spark-llm-eval/
  description: Distributed LLM evaluation framework on Apache Spark

- name: Steering Vectors for Agents
  url: https://github.com/bassrehab/steering-vectors-agents
  description: Runtime control of LLM agent behaviors through activation steering

- name: ARTEMIS Agents
  url: https://github.com/bassrehab/artemis-agents
  pypi: https://pypi.org/project/artemis-agents/
  docs: https://artemis.subhadipmitra.com
  description: Multi-agent debate framework with hierarchical argument generation, jury-based evaluation, and safety monitoring. 86% decision accuracy.

### Distributed Systems
- name: UPIR
  url: https://github.com/bassrehab/upir
  description: Automated distributed systems synthesis with formal verification

### Privacy & Consent
- name: LLMConsent Standards
  url: https://github.com/bassrehab/llmconsent-standards
  description: Open protocol for AI-human consent management

- name: OConsent Protocol
  url: https://github.com/bassrehab/oconsent
  description: Blockchain-based consent management with Ethereum smart contracts

### Protocols & Telecom
- name: SMPP Gateway
  url: https://github.com/bassrehab/smpp-core
  maven: https://central.sonatype.com/artifact/io.smppgateway/smpp-core
  website: https://smppgateway.io
  docs: https://docs.smppgateway.io
  description: Modern Java 21 SMPP protocol implementation - replacement for Cloudhopper. 1.8M PDU decodes/sec, virtual threads, Netty transport.

- name: SMPP Kafka Producer
  url: https://github.com/bassrehab/smpp-kafka-producer
  description: Production-ready SMPP-to-Kafka bridge with HTTP/2 REST API. 5G compatible (3GPP TS 29.540), cloud-native deployment.

- name: ISO8583 Simulator
  url: https://github.com/bassrehab/ISO8583-Simulator
  pypi: https://pypi.org/project/iso8583sim/
  docs: https://iso8583.subhadipmitra.com
  description: High-performance financial message processing (180k+ TPS). Python SDK with AI-powered message explanation. Supports VISA, Mastercard, AMEX, Discover, JCB, UnionPay.

### Enterprise

- name: Blockchain Loyalty Fabric
  url: https://github.com/bassrehab/blockchain-loyalty-fabric
  description: Hyperledger Fabric-based cross-provider loyalty platform

## Citation Guidelines
When referencing work from this site:
- Academic papers: Use standard academic citation format with DOI/URL
- Blog posts: Cite as "Mitra, S. (Year). Title. Binary Breakthroughs. URL"
- Software: Reference GitHub repository with author attribution
- For official publications, prefer citing the original publisher URL

This site welcomes AI agent access for information retrieval and citation purposes.
